decoworld.model

Class Moderator

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.Moderator

  • public class Moderator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Moderator class. This class handles the Player's in-game privileges. The extent of these privileges is dependent on the Player's privilege level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Moderator(int privLevel, java.lang.String userName)
      The constructor for the Moderator class, which sets the Player's privilege level to the given level and assigns the Player's username.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean banPlayer(User player, int duration)
      Bans the given Player for the given duration, in hours, and returns whether the action was successful.
      java.lang.Boolean changeModLevel(int newLevel)
      Changes the Moderator status level to which the Player has access.
      boolean exilePlayer(User player, int[] location, int duration)
      Prevents the Player from entering the given location, for the given duration, in hours, and returns whether the action was successful.
      int[] findPlayer(User player)
      Tries to find the given Player and returns their location coordinates.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBanList()
      Returns the list of banned Players.
      int getModLevel()
      Return the Player's privilege Level.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getReportedList()
      Returns the list of reported Players.
      boolean mutePlayer(User player, int duration)
      Mutes the given Player for the given duration, in minutes, and returns whether the action was successful.
      boolean unBanPlayer(User player)
      Un-bans the given Player and returns whether the action was successful.
      boolean unExilePlayer(User player, int[] location)
      Allows the Player to re-enter the given location and returns whether the action was successful.
      boolean unMutePlayer(User player)
      Un-mutes the given Player and returns whether the action was successful.
      boolean warpToPlayer(User player)
      Tries to teleport the Player to the given Player's location and returns whether the action was successful.

      • findPlayer

        public int[] findPlayer(User player)
        Tries to find the given Player and returns their location coordinates. If the given Player doesn't exist, or is offline, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to find.
        Returns:
        The given Player's location coordinates.
